properties.entry: SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD A WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#selectInfoBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NO , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE , A.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NO , B.CATEGORY_NO , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.VIEW_NO , B.CREATION_DATE , B.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT C.POST_NO , C.CATEGORY_NO , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.POST_TITLE , C.POST_CONTENT , C.USER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.VIEW_NO , C.CREATION_DATE , C.VIEW_YN FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD C JOIN TBL_INFO_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TBL_USER E ON(C.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.POST_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#insertInfoBoard() */ INTO TBL_INFO_BOARD A ( A.POST_NO , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.CREATION_DATE , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_INFO_POST_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , 1 )
UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#updateInfoBoard() */ TBL_INFO_BOARD A SET A.POST_TITLE = ? , A.POST_CONTENT = ? WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.POST_NO = ?
UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#deleteInfoBoard() */ TBL_INFO_BOARD A SET A.VIEW_YN = 'N' WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.POST_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#selectInfoBoardDetail() */ A.POST_NO , A.CATEGORY_NO , C.CATEGORY_NAME , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD A JOIN TBL_USER B ON (A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) JOIN TBL_INFO_CATEGORY C ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.POST_NO = ?

UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#incrementInfoBoardCount() */ TBL_INFO_BOARD A SET A.VIEW_NO = (SELECT B.VIEW_NO FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD B WHERE POST_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.POST_NO = ?
SELECT SUM(A.VIEW_NO) , B.CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD A JOIN TBL_INFO_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE B.CATEGORY_NO = ? GROUP BY B.CATEGORY_NAME

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#searchCategoryInfoBoardCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD A JOIN TBL_INFO_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND B.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#searchTitleInfoBoardCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD A WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#searchContentInfoBoardCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD A WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#searchCategoryInfoBoard() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NO , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE , A.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NO , B.CATEGORY_NO , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.VIEW_NO , B.CREATION_DATE , B.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT C.POST_NO , C.CATEGORY_NO , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.POST_TITLE , C.POST_CONTENT , C.USER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.VIEW_NO , C.CREATION_DATE , C.VIEW_YN FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD C JOIN TBL_INFO_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TBL_USER E ON(C.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.POST_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#searchTitleInfoBoard() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NO , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE , A.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NO , B.CATEGORY_NO , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.VIEW_NO , B.CREATION_DATE , B.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT C.POST_NO , C.CATEGORY_NO , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.POST_TITLE , C.POST_CONTENT , C.USER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.VIEW_NO , C.CREATION_DATE , C.VIEW_YN FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD C JOIN TBL_INFO_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TBL_USER E ON(C.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.POST_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.infoboard.model.dao.InfoBoardDAO#searchContentInfoBoard() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NO , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE , A.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NO , B.CATEGORY_NO , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.VIEW_NO , B.CREATION_DATE , B.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT C.POST_NO , C.CATEGORY_NO , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.POST_TITLE , C.POST_CONTENT , C.USER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.VIEW_NO , C.CREATION_DATE , C.VIEW_YN FROM TBL_INFO_BOARD C JOIN TBL_INFO_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TBL_USER E ON(C.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.POST_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
